alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations; East Laramie County; Goshen County; Niobrara County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 16 at 12:54AM MST until December 16 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Strong winds and widespread blowing snow. Visibility as low as one half mile at times. Wind gusts in excess of 55 MPH expected. * WHERE...Northern Nebraska Panhandle including Sioux, Dawes, and Box Butte Counties. This includes the cities of Chadron, Alliance, and Harrison. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions due to icy, snow packed roads and significantly reduced visibilities in blowing snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Converse County Lower Elevations; East Laramie County; Goshen County; Niobrara County
